name: webpack-config-jaid
description: Takes tiny input and returns a Webpack config in the way I personally like.
author: Jaid <jaid.jsx@gmail.com> (https://github.com/Jaid)

scripts.babel:prod: rimraf dist/transpiled/production && NODE_ENV=production babel --out-dir dist/transpiled/production --source-maps true src
scripts.babel:dev: rimraf dist/transpiled/development && NODE_ENV=development babel --out-dir dist/transpiled/development src
scripts.babel:test: rimraf dist/transpiled/test && NODE_ENV=test babel --out-dir dist/transpiled/test src
scripts.test: npm run build:prod && NODE_ENV=production MAIN=dist/package/production/index.js jest
scripts.test:dev: npm run build:dev && NODE_ENV=test MAIN=dist/package/development/index.js jest
scripts.buildWebapp:prod: npm run build:dev && cd testWebapp && npm install && npm run build:prod
scripts.buildWebapp:dev: npm run build:dev && cd testWebapp && npm install && npm run build:dev
scripts.hmrWebapp: npm run build:dev && cd testWebapp && npm install && npm start
